==  Danish Dependency Treebank V1 ==

== Danish Dependency Treebank v. 1.0 ==

* [http://copenhagen-dependency-treebank.googlecode.com/svn/ Matthias T. Kromann][[BR]][http://www.id.cbs.dk Department of Computational Linguistics][[BR]][http://www.cbs.dk Copenhagen Business School][[BR]] (project coordinator, main author) *

* [http://www.id.cbs.dk/~stine Stine Kern Lynge][[BR]][http://www.id.cbs.dk Department of Computational Linguistics][[BR]][http://www.cbs.dk Copenhagen Business School][[BR]] (research assistant) *

The Danish Dependency Treebank v. 1.0 consists of 536 Parole texts, consisting of 5.540 sentences, 100.195 words, or 34.4% of the morphosyntactically annotated part of the Danish Parole corpus. The treebank is distributed under the GNU Public License, an open-source license. The treebank is encoded both in in [http://www.id.cbs.dk/~mtk/dtag DTAG format] and in [http://www.ims.uni-stuttgart.de/projekte/TIGER/TIGERSearch/doc/html/TigerXML.html TIGER-XML]. You can download the treebank compressed with either "zip" (Windows) or "tar" and "gzip" (UNIX) by clicking on the appropriate link below.

  * [http://copenhagen-dependency-treebank.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/files/ddt-1.0.zip Danish Dependency Treebank version 1.0 (zip compression)] (6,876 kB)
  * [http://copenhagen-dependency-treebank.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/files/ddt-1.0.tgz Danish Dependency Treebank version 1.0 (tar.gz compression)] (4,639 kB)

The included [http://copenhagen-dependency-treebank.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/files/README.html README file] describes how to install and use the treebank. You can also view a graphical visualization of the [http://copenhagen-dependency-treebank.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/files/parole00-0.8.pdf first 18 texts] (233 kB) or [http://copenhagen-dependency-treebank.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/files/parole-0.8.pdf all 474 texts] (5,681 kB). Alternatively, you can download the Danish Dependency Treebank from [http://korpus.dsl.dk/e-resurser Society for Danish Language and Literature]. The treebank is accompanied by an [http://copenhagen-dependency-treebank.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/index.html online annotation manual].If you have any questions about the treebank, please contact [mailto:mtk@id.cbs.dk mtk@id.cbs.dk].
